item.description:
The intention of this group is to allow you to connect to our own inner peace and happiness by connecting to loving healing energy.  It's time away from everyday challenges and stresses so that you can recharge and feel better in body, mind and spirit. 

The group sits in a circle and holds a sacred space for each other.  The circle starts in meditation, followed by Reiki share and ends with a short meditation.  The intention that the group starts and ends together so that there are no interuptions. 

This circle is open to those who want to share their Reiki energy and those who want to receive Reiki.  A donation can be made for the use of the space. 

Come raise your vibration and feel the loving connection of this great community.

group.name: The Light Within - Yoga, Reiki, Meditation - Dorchester MA

item.name: Free Reiki Circle with Meditation
